xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: 1.tStatement of Assets and Liabilities as on 31st December, 2019 is given below. n (` in lacs) nParticularstAs on 31.12.2019tAs on 31.03.2019tAs on 31.12.2018 nt(Unaudited)t(Audited)t(Unaudited) nCAPITAL AND LIABILITIES t t t nCapitalt563,95t514,33t513,98 nReserves and Surplust85,633,89t66,161,97t66,183,92 nDepositst5,91,675,52t5,48,471,34t5,14,092,11 nBorrowingst1,12,006,70t1,52,775,78t1,44,669,38 nOther Liabilities and Provisionst29,158,85t33,073,11t30,717,03 nTOTAL t8,19,038,91t8,00,996,53t7,56,176,42 nASSETS ttt nCash and Balances with Reserve Bank of Indiat31,959,48t35,099,03t38,138,01 nBalances with Banks and Money at Call and Short Noticet9,351,91t32,105,60t17,598,18 nInvestmentst1,55,979,19t1,74,969,28t1,61,035,76 nAdvancest5,50,137,70t4,94,797,97t4,75,104,88 nFixed Assetst4,203,99t4,036,64t3,988,32 nOther Assetst67,406,64t59,988,01t60,311,27 nTOTALt8,19,038,91t8,00,996,53t7,56,176,42 n n n2.t‘Other income’ includes gains from securities’ transactions, commission earned from guarantees/letters of credit, fees earned from providing services to customers, selling of third party products, ATM sharing fees, recoveries from written off accounts etc. n n3.tDuring the quarter ended 31st December, 2019, the Bank allotted 597,330 equity shares pursuant to the exercise of options under its Employee Stock Option Scheme. n n4.tIn accordance with RBI circular DBR.No.BP.BC.1/21.06.201/2015-16 dated 1st July, 2015 on ‘Basel III Capital Regulations’ and RBI circular DBR.No.BP.BC.80/21.06.201/2014-15 dated 31st March, 2015 on ‘Prudential Guidelines on Capital Adequacy and Liquidity Standards Amendments’, banks are required to make Pillar 3 disclosures including leverage ratio and liquidity coverage ratio under the Basel III framework. The Bank has made these disclosures which are available on its website at the following link: http://www.axisbank.com/investor-corner/baselIII-disclosures.aspx. The disclosures have not been subjected to audit or limited review by the statutory auditors of the Bank. n n5.tThe above results have been approved by the Board of Directors of the Bank at its meeting held at Mumbai today. n n6.tThese results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2019 have been subjected to a Limited Review by the statutory auditors of the Bank. n n7.tPrevious period figures have been regrouped and reclassified, where necessary, to make them comparable with current period figures.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOperatingExpense: Depreciation on bank's property (incl. impairment provision)
Depreciation on bank's property (incl. impairment provision)
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: Note: Effective 1st April 2019, the Bank has reported inter segment revenue and inter segment expense in the Central Funding Unit (which forms part of Treasury segment) on a net basis as against earlier practice of reporting revenue and expenses on a gross basis. Accordingly, segmental revenue numbers for the previous periods have been restated to make them comparable with current period numbers. There is no impact of this change on the segmental profit before tax.
